rukus.text: Ta, seen. These are the verses of the Qur´an _ a clear lucid book
A guidance and good news for the believers
Those who establish ´salat´ and pay ´zakat´. Those who are certain about the life-to-come
And there are those who do not believe in the afterlife. We make their deeds seem delightful to them. So they just wander about blindly
An evil torment is in store for such people. They are the ones who would be the losers in the afterlife
Indeed, you are definitely receiving this Qur´an from the Wise, the Knowledgeable
(Remember) when Musa said to his family, "I notice a fire at a distance. I will get you some information from there, or (at least) get you a live coal so you may stay warm
And when he got there a voice rang out, "Blessed is the One in the fire and all around it. Exalted is Allah, the Lord of the universe
Oh Musa! This is I, Allah, the most Powerful and the Wisest

Throw down your stick!" When (Musa) saw the stick wriggling about like a snake, he turned his back and ran, and did not look back. "Oh Musa do not be afraid! Indeed, in My presence a messenger has nothing to fear
Unless he commits an offense. Then, if he replaces the bad (deeds) with the good (deeds, he will find that) I am the most Forgiving and the most Merciful
Put your hand in your pocket. It will come out looking white without any (stain or) pain. (Another one of) nine signs for the pharaoh and his people. Indeed, they are a wanton sinful nation
But when Our signs reached them as clear proofs, they said, "This is an obvious magic
Their hearts were convinced, but they still rejected it unjustly and with arrogance. Now, see what became of the mischief mongers
